//Agents First Question You can hear only one time the voice line of the agent. Your question is: Who is this Agent?
Second Question You have part of the picture of some agent. Your question is: Who is this Agent? Sova Brimstone Harbor Chamber
Third Question You have video with a sound of ult on someone agent. Your question is: Who is this Agent?
Fourth Question The agent is Sentinel.Can hold side alone. The agent have smoke and when you go in them they make a noise.Your question is: Who is this Agent? Phoenix KillJoy Cypher
Fifth Question Raze: \"......, you listen to the weirdest music. Lots of duntz\-duntz\-duntz\-duntz\-duntz. How do you dance to it?\" For which agent raze is saying that?
//Maps First Question You have the map. Your question is: Which point is calling Snowman?
Second Question You have picture of scheme of some map. Your question is: Who is this Map? Fracture Icebox
Third Question You have a picture of the map. Your question is: Who is this Maps?
Fourth Question You have a pictures of four maps. Your question is: Which map was first add in the game?
Fifth Question You have part of drawing: Your question is: From which map is the drawing?
//Weapons First Question You have sound of weapon which is from shotguns. Your question is: Which is that weapon?
Second Question You have picture of scheme of some map. Your question is: Who is this Map?
Third Question You have a picture of the map. Your question is: Who is this Maps?
Fourth Question You have a pictures of four maps. Your question is: Which map was first add in the game?
Fifth Question You have part of drawing: Your question is: From which map is the drawing?
